metadata.title: CVE-2024-34030 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: PCI:of_property: Return error for int_map allocation failure Return -ENOMEMfrom of_pci_prop_intr_map() if kcalloc() fails to prevent a NULL pointerdereference in this case. [bhelgaas: commit log]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
